description: Monitor for attempts to access SYSVOL that involve searching for XML files. Analytic 1 - Unauthorized access to SYSVOL XML files. index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4663 ObjectName="*SYSVOL*" ObjectName="*.xml" | eval AccessType=case( AccessMask="0x1", "Read", AccessMask="0x2", "Write", AccessMask="0x3", "Read/Write", AccessMask="0x4", "Delete", true(), "Unknown" )
